long_description: Designed for skiers and boarders who value comfort and convenience, and looks that stand out on the hill, the waterproof Marmot Arcs insulated jacket protects you, and keeps you warm and looking good. MemBrain(R) 2-layer waterproof, breathable laminated fabric fends off moisture and wind while reducing internal condensation, so you stay dry, warm and comfortable. All seams are taped to prevent moisture from seeping in. Thermal R polyester fiber insulation keeps you warm on cold winter mornings; Thermal R insulation has an excellent warmth-to-weight ratio and is very durable. Removable internal powder skirt helps seal out cold air and wet snow while retaining valuable warmth. PitZips(TM) extend along body of jacket, offering excellent ventilation control. Zip-off storm hood with laminated brim protects you in poor conditions. Roomy Angel-Wing Movement(TM) fit accommodates layering so you can stay comfortable at both the top and bottom of the mountain. Front zipper, sleeve pocket, chest pocket and hand pockets have water-resistant zippers to keep moisture out; jacket also has zippered sunglass pocket and mesh goggles pocket. Polyester-lined collar and shoulders wick moisture and are soft against your skin. Marmot Arcs insulated jacket has rip-and-stick cuffs and an elastic drawcord hem that help seal warmth in.
